title: Stock Stamp Duty May Hand Hong Kong Operating Surplus, RTHK Says
description: Higher stock trading stamp duty revenue may enable the Hong Kong government to return its day-to-day budget back to a surplus sooner than expected, Financial Secretary Paul Chan told RTHK on Saturday.
content: Higher stock trading stamp duty revenue may enable the Hong Kong government to return its day-to-day budget back to a surplus sooner than expected, Financial Secretary Paul Chan told RTHK on Saturday.
